entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
